goal: Order a Large Supreme Pizza and a side of garlic knots from 'Luigi's Pizzeria'. After the order is placed, draft an email to leo@email.com and mikey@email.com, letting them know the total was $42.50 and their share is $14.17 each.

evals.description: Order was placed on DashDish from Luigi's Pizzeria

evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Email was drafted or sent from GoMail
evals.query: gomail.draftEmails != null && length(gomail.draftEmails.added) > `0` || gomail.sentEmails != null && length(gomail.sentEmails.added) > `0`

evals.rubric: Does the email mention that the total was $42.50 and each person's share is $14.17?
